caption:
This photograph features an elderly couple standing in front of a small, light gray-sided house. The man, positioned on the left, wears a light-colored shirt and dark trousers. He has a slightly solemn expression and sports a receding hairline and glasses. His right arm is bent, and he is leaning slightly towards the woman.

The woman, to the man's right, is dressed in a long-sleeve flannel shirt with a plaid pattern and light-colored pants. She wears glasses, has short gray hair, and appears to be smiling gently.

The house behind them has a simple, white door and basic concrete steps leading up to it. Thereâ€™s a chimney visible to the right of the house, and it appears to be constructed with a different, lighter material than the rest of the building.

In the background, there is a well-kept lawn and a woodpile neatly stacked against a small, dark wooden shed. Trees are faintly visible in the distant background, suggesting a rural or suburban setting.

Overall, the photograph captures a serene and somewhat pensive moment between two elderly individuals, possibly reflecting on their life together in what appears to be a quiet, residential setting. The image has a vintage feel, perhaps taken in the late 20th century, suggesting a moment of everyday life preserved in time.
title: Mr. and Mrs. Dwight Rogers, a retired couple, live on a small farm near Grygla. Mr. Rogers cuts firewood and keeps a garden.
location: Lake of the Woods County, Minnesota
